evidence.claim: Ecompex, Inc. emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health information.
The company offers services that support X12 standards for electronic data interchange in healthcare.
Ecompex utilizes HL7 FHIR standards for interoperability in digital health systems.

icp.icp_reason: Focused on HIPAA compliance and X12 EDI transactions, aligning with target ICP criteria.
